Boxplot of normalized motif counts (internal helper)

plot_motif_box.Rd

Visualize normalized motif counts (e.g., from get_norm_counts()) across samples for a given motif.

Usage

plot_motif_box(
  norm_counts,
  motif_key,
  layer = NULL,
  sample_df = NULL,
  group_var = NULL,
  offset_mode = NULL
)

Arguments

norm_counts

List of normalized counts (e.g., cellgraph$norm_counts from count_motifs_graphs()); when multiple offset modes are present, select one via offset_mode.

motif_key

Character motif identifier with prefix (e.g., "E_A_B").

layer

Which layer to plot; when NULL, inferred from the motif prefix (N_, E_, T_, W_, or TW_).

sample_df

Optional data frame of sample metadata; rownames must match the motif columns.

group_var

Optional column name in sample_df to use for grouping/coloring the boxplot.

Value

A ggplot object.
